item.title: Skillcapes, Delta, 317 Help quickly please
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Copy the examples for the items that do work. If you already have copied the examples, and it’s still not working, try using a different variation for the name.

EX:

Thieving cape
Thieving Cape
thieving Cape
thieving cape

It’s extremely sensitive.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcapes, Delta, 317 Help quickly please
item.dc:creator: @PIEBAR2FAR PIEBAR2FAR
item.description:
@PIEBAR2FAR wrote:

public int GetCLThieving(int ItemID) {
	if (ItemID == -1) {
		return 1;
	}
	String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID);
	if (ItemName.startsWith("Thieving cape")) {
		return 99;
	}
	if (ItemName.startsWith("Thieving hood")) {
		return 99;
	}
	return 1;
}

That’s my thieving level requirements from the Wearing.java folder, as you can see i’m trying to make it so i can only wear a thieving cape at level 99, but i can wear the cape at any level, the same goes for all of my skill capes, but i do have working Armour and weapon requirements,the only things that don’t work are skill capes how do i fix that?

Read full topic
